anime.name: Muybridge's Strings
anime.info: A Canadian/Japanese animated art film; based loosely on a number of famous early experiments in motion picture photography. It's occasionally surreal, alternating between monochrome and color art and sequential frames of movie film. There is a series of impressions without a coherent plot. Artistic nudity in animation and photography.
anime.news: Oscar Nominee Yamamura to Preview Next Work This Month
